combat1.name: Normal Attack: Ancient Sword Art
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
**Charged Attack**
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
combat2.info:
Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents.

**Herald of Frost**
- On hit, Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attacks regenerate HP for your own party members and nearby teammates. Healing scales based on Qiqi's ATK.
- Periodically regenerates your active character's HP.
- Follows the character around, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in their path.
combat2.description: I use this to prevent warming and rot... of Dr. Bai's precious ingredients. Yes.

combat3.name: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
combat3.info:
Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within her body, marking nearby enemies with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals Cryo DMG.

**Fortune-Preserving Talisman**
When enemies affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP.
combat3.description:
"I am the Fortune Preserver, the Maiden of Resurrection."
â€” Qiqi does not remember these words.

passive1.name: Life-Prolonging Methods
passive1.info: When a character under the effects of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.

passive2.name: A Glimpse into Arcanum
passive2.info: When Qiqi hits enemies with her Normal or Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This effect can only occur once every 30s.

passive3.name: Former Life Memories
passive3.info: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.
